TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit UidManager extends Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Task

Docs.summary: Implements the `UidManager` task. Use the `UidManager` element in your project file to create and execute this task. For usage and parameter information, see [UidManager](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Execute() cil managed

Docs.returns: if the task executed successfully; otherwise, .

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the directory that is used to back up the source [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] files that are specified by the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.UidManager.MarkupFiles%2A> property.
Docs.value: The directory that is used to back up the source [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] files that are specified by the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.UidManager.MarkupFiles%2A> property.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the source [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] files to include for UID checking, updating, or removing.
Docs.value: The source [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] files to include for UID checking, updating, or removing.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the UID management task that you want to perform. Valid options are **Check**, **Update**, or **Remove**.
Docs.value: The UID management task that you want to perform. Valid options are **Check**, **Update**, or **Remove**.
